title.rendered: Deuren Gio Glass Bifold Etimoe Doors

acf.content: Our interior bifold doors are the perfect addition to any modern or contemporary room setting. These glazed internal doors can be opened fully to create space between two rooms or closed to separate two areas. Deuren oak bifold doors are also trackless, meaning no unsightly floor track is required ensuring a beautiful aesthetic and floor within your home.

title.rendered: Deuren Gio Glass Teak Internal Door

acf.content: The natural tone of the teak Gio internal door makes it an ideal choice for both contemporary and traditionally styled homes. The central glass pane allows light to flood into the room and creates the illusion of extra space. The subtle pattern of the teak wood grain adds character to the room whilst blending in with your existing décor.
